activities: CPI UK are registered under UK Data Protection Laws as a bureau to collect and process Personal Information on behalf of their clients. This information may be passed to CPI systems in the USA in order to facilitate the production of physical or virtual payment and loyalty cards
personaldata: Information collected is limited to that processed under the bureau registration for the UK.  Individuals may supply name and address and CPI UK may pass this information to the CPI secure US network in order to facilitate production of the card.  No data is manually processed, all information is retained in secured databases within systems controlled by PCI compliant access control mechanisms.
recoursemech: Initial dispute resolution would take place between CPI UK Data Protection personnel, as registered with the UK Information Commissioners Office. Escalation of any issue would result in CPI Inc. senior management ensuring resolution directly with the UK Information Commissioners Office as the regulatory body responsible for Data Protection in the UK.
